Package org.forgerock.openidm.external

Class ExternalException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.io.IOException
org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
org.forgerock.openidm.external.ExternalException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.forgerock.json.resource.Response
public class ExternalException extends org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
A ResourceException that wraps a ResourceException generated externally to IDM, such as an external REST call.
